title: Watch the OPL Grand Final at HOYTS

replies.body: this is sick ima go and watch diss
Why is it $15 per ticket when it says $15+BF????
Hey EternalS1ayer, BF=Booking Fee which is $1.50 per ticket!
Ahhhh I can't watch it. Should I be rescheduling my birthday party????{{sticker:cass-cry}}
That's definitely a hard decision... which team winning would be the perfect birthday present?
If Legacy and Dire Wolves are in the final that would be amazing{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
WHHYYY NOT CANBERRA. YOU KNOW? THE CAPITAL?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
